IpamOperatingRegion.description: The regions IPAM is enabled for. Allows pools to be created in these regions, as well as enabling monitoring

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: OperatingRegions
properties.description: The regions IPAM is enabled for. Allows pools to be created in these regions, as well as enabling monitoring

type.description: The regions IPAM is enabled for. Allows pools to be created in these regions, as well as enabling monitoring

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IPAM.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IPAM.

properties.name: DefaultResourceDiscoveryAssociationId
properties.description: The Id of the default association to the default resource discovery, created with this IPAM.

type.description: The Id of the default association to the default resource discovery, created with this IPAM.

properties.name: DefaultResourceDiscoveryId
properties.description: The Id of the default resource discovery, created with this IPAM.

type.description: The Id of the default resource discovery, created with this IPAM.

properties.name: PrivateDefaultScopeId
properties.description: The Id of the default scope for publicly routable IP space, created with this IPAM.

type.description: The Id of the default scope for publicly routable IP space, created with this IPAM.

properties.name: PublicDefaultScopeId
properties.description: The Id of the default scope for publicly routable IP space, created with this IPAM.

type.description: The Id of the default scope for publicly routable IP space, created with this IPAM.

properties.name: ResourceDiscoveryAssociationCount
properties.description: The count of resource discoveries associated with this IPAM.

type.description: The count of resource discoveries associated with this IPAM.

properties.name: ScopeCount
properties.description: The number of scopes that currently exist in this IPAM.

type.description: The number of scopes that currently exist in this IPAM.
